title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the FeedbackTranslator tool, including the target users, use cases, and desired features.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, integration points, and infrastructure requirements. Consider the following aspects: user interface, natural language processing, machine learning models, data storage, deployment environment, scalability, security, and monitoring/logging.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module responsible for understanding and interpreting feedback text.

title: Develop Feedback Translation Module
description: Implement the module responsible for translating feedback into clear, constructive language.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the FeedbackTranslator tool, including input and output interfaces.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving feedback data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and secure access to the tool.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: Create Test Suite and Test Cases
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and test cases to ensure the quality and functionality of the FeedbackTranslator tool.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides.
